📢 Announcement

Welcome to DM301 – Advanced Digital Marketing: Analytics and Optimization!

This course is designed for learners who already understand the basics of digital marketing or have completed DM201: Strategy and Implementation. We’ll now take a deep dive into tracking, optimizing, and automating campaigns across digital platforms.

By the end of this course, you'll know how to:

  • 📊 Use analytics tools like Google Analytics and Meta Insights
  • 🔁 Set up A/B testing for ads and landing pages
  • 📈 Interpret performance metrics to improve ROI
  • 🧠 Automate reporting and build dashboards

To get started:

  • Click the Show Me Around button in the right-hand navigation to explore how this platform works.
  • Then click Introduction in the left-hand course outline to begin your advanced journey.

🎓 Let’s go beyond strategy and into the data that powers it. Welcome to DM301!
